# pause(_:)

**Instance Method**

Pauses a set of downloads.

## Declaration

```swift
func pause(_ downloads: [SKDownload])
```

## Parameters

- **downloads**: An array of [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKDownload] objects to pause.

## Downloading Content

- **start(_:)**: Adds a set of downloads to the download list.
- **cancel(_:)**: Removes a set of downloads from the download list.
- **resume(_:)**: Resumes a set of downloads.
